comment: * A builder for TtsSpans of type {@link #TYPE_DATE}.

methods.name: public DateBuilder setWeekday(int weekday)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link #ARG_WEEKDAY} argument.
         * @param weekday The value to be set for weekday. See
         *     {@link #ARG_WEEKDAY}.
         * @return This instance.
         * @see #ARG_WEEKDAY
